Pacifica Natural Coverage Tinted Serum, Teinte 04

Brand: Pacifica

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA (EAU), SQUALANE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, COCO-CAPRYLATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, PROPANEDIOL, XANTHAN GUM, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E), LAUROYL LYSINE, SODIUM PHYTATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM BENZOATE,

GLYCERYL STEARATE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, PROPANEDIOL, XANTHAN GUM, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E), LAUROYL LYSINE, SODIUM PHYTATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, GLYCERIN, ASCORBIC ACID, SR-HYDROZOAN POLYPEPTIDE-1, CAFFEINE, CITRIC ACID, NIACINAMIDE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FLOWER EXTRACT, JASMINUM

SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, GLYCERIN, ASCORBIC ACID, SR-HYDROZOAN POLYPEPTIDE-1, CAFFEINE, CITRIC ACID, NIACINAMIDE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FLOWER EXTRACT, JASMINUM OFFICINALE (JASMINE) FLOWER EXTRACT, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, PHENOXYETHANOL. MAY CONTAIN: TITANIUM DIOXIDE CI 77891, CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
